snippet.title: HordeCore Prologue
snippet.description:
HordeCore Prologue is a chance to try out a new kick-ass side-scrolling shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Play alone, or as a team - and destroy, survive, craft, and explore!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/980210/HordeCore/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HordeCoreGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HordeCoreGame 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/HordeCoreGame/
Discord: https://discord.gg/bz7cvyT
